items.text: rocks back and pulls over wide long on! Half-tracker on middle, and that gets the treatment it deserves. Into the second tier
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Karthik, SIX runs

items.text: good length outside off, and DK walks down the ground. The ball's almost beaten him by the time he plays a late cut to short third man
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Karthik, no run

items.text: full just outside off, and he caresses the drive back to the bowler
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Karthik, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, and angling across Dhoni. Left alone
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full on middle, and pushed down the ground to mid off. Ariful - the sub - races towards the ball, and his move ensures India don't take a single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and it's too close to Dhoni's body for the drive. But he goes for the shot anyway, and shovels it to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: offcutter, lands full outside off. Going through to the keeper with MSD offering no shot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full on off, and Dhoni skips down the ground. Whips a shot to midwicket, and says no to the single. The throw at the non-striker's end almost hits the stumps, and almost hits DK as well
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: back of a length on middle stump to end the over. Tapped off the back foot to the vacant cover region for a walking single
items.postText: Siddharth: "Brilliant captaincy by Mashrafe. Getting as many as 6 fielders in the circle has completely dried the singles. Pressure on India "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and the straight drive takes an inside edge. Trickles away to the leg side
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full just outside off stump, but angling into Dhoni. Pushed off the front foot to cover point
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full on off, and Dhoni comes down the ground. Drives past the non-striker to mid on for a quick single
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, and DK backs away to make some room. Cuts in front of square, but intercepted by the diving cover fielder
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Karthik, no run

items.text: full on off, and straightens after pitching. Fended off the back foot
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Karthik, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and Karthik sees the over out with the bat's full face. Blocked back to the bowler
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Karthik, no run

items.text: full on off, and Dhoni crunches a mistimed cover-drive through the infield! Not off the bat's middle, but he muscles it courtesy his bottom hand past Mashrafe at cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, FOUR runs

items.text: good length on off, and angling away from him. Tries to cut, but the ball's too close to his body. Mistimed to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full on off and going across the batsman. Left alone
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: full and straight on middle stump. Pushed off the front foot to Mashrafe at short cover
items.postText: Jigar Panchal: "Appreciation for Bangladesh to do well after getting bowled out for considerably lower score than possible."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: good length on middle, and that's been clipped off his hips past square leg. Nice early call for the second run from MSD
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, 2 runs

items.text: offcutter to end the over. Full just outside off, and caressed off the front foot to cover point
items.postText: Aayush Anand: "This is what I hate! You really do not need to slow down like this. "
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhoni, no run

items.text: length ball on off stump, and spins sharply into the batsman. Pulled over square leg to the man in the deep
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Karthik, 1 run

items.text: drilled! Gives the bowler a charge, and the full-pitched delivery has been smacked past Mehidy's left! Long off has no chance either
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhoni, FOUR runs

items.text: slower through the air. Full on off, and he taps this past the non-striker to long on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhoni, 1 run

items.text: good length just outside off. No real turn on this occasion. Smothered off his hips to the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Karthik, no run
